TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class DataKeyArray : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataKeyArray extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class DataKeyArray Implements ICollection, IStateManager
public ref class DataKeyArray sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理集合的对象。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects. A对象表示的数据绑定控件中的记录的主键。A object represents the primary key of a record in a data-bound control. 一般情况下，数据绑定控件显示的多个记录 (如控件) 使用要存储对象控件中显示的记录的对象。In general, data-bound controls that display multiple records (such as the control) use a object to store the objects for the records displayed in the control. 类支持多种方法可访问集合中的项：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用索引器以直接检索从集合中特定的从零开始索引处的对象。Use the indexer to directly retrieve a object from the collection at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法来检索可用于循环访问集合的枚举。Use the method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法以将项复制到一个数组，用于访问集合中的项集合中。Use the method to copy the items in the collection into an array, which can then be used to access the items in the collection. 若要确定集合中项的总数，请使用属性。To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器检索对象集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a object from a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/CS/DataKeyArrayItemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/VB/DataKeyArrayItemvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问集合。The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through a collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArray/CS/DataKeyArraycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArray/VB/DataKeyArrayvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类使用指定对象。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified object. 对象包含用来填充集合的对象。The object contains the objects with which to populate the collection.

param.span: 从零开始的 对象的数组，它从集合中接收复制的项。

span.span: A zero-based array of objects that receives the copied items from the collection.

param.span: 指定的数组中接收复制内容的第一个索引。

span.span: The first index in the specified array to receive the copied contents.

summary.span: 将此集合中的所有项复制到 对象的指定数组（从数组中的指定索引位置开始）。

span.span: Copies all the items from this collection to the specified array of objects, starting at the specified index in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用若要将项从指定的数组，从指定索引处开始将集合复制的方法。Use the method to copy the items from the collection into the specified array, starting at the specified index. 该数组然后用于访问集合中的项。The array can then be used to access the items in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 你必须使用一数组从零开始的`array`参数。You must use a zero-based array for the `array` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以复制对象从指向数组的集合对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the objects from a collection to an array of objects. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/CS/DataKeyArrayItemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayItem/VB/DataKeyArrayItemvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定集合中的项的数目。Use the property to determine the number of items in the collection. 当循环访问集合以确定其上限时，通常使用属性。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound. 属性通常还用于确定集合是否为空。The property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否集合为空。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a collection is empty. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/CS/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/VB/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个包含集合中的所有 对象的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that contains all objects in the collection.

returns.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含集合中的所有 对象。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains all objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以获取可以按线性方式循环访问集合中的每个项的枚举。Use the method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the collection. 若要访问的枚举器中当前位置处的项，使用属性。To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the property. 使用方法将移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 若要将枚举器移到其初始位置，使用方法。To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当你最初获取枚举数或使用方法将枚举器移到的第一项在集合中，必须调用方法。When you initially get the enumerator or use the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 否则，表示的项属性是不确定。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问枚举数由方法。The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through the enumerator created by the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/CS/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyArrayGetEnumerator/VB/DataKeyArrayGetEnumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否中的项可以修改集合。Use the property to determine whether the items in the collection can be modified. > [!NOTE] > 此属性已被重写以始终返回`false`，以指示中的对象可以添加或移除对象。This property has been overridden to always return `false`, to indicate that the objects in the object can be added or removed. 对象本身不能更改。The objects themselves cannot be changed.

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否是线程安全的对象。Use the property to determine whether the object is thread safe. > [!NOTE] > 此属性已被重写以始终返回`false`，则指示对象不是线程安全。This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the object is not thread safe. 有关详细信息属性，请参阅属性接口。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法以将标记开始跟踪并将更改保存到的起始点对象作为对象的视图状态的一部分。This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the object as part of the object's view state.
